title: Google Contacts app "Failed to open editor" for DUPLICATE contacts in the app. Why?
content:
When I open the Google Contacts app, there are some identical contacts; some have as much as 3 or 4 duplicates. I get the message "Failed to open editor" when I attempt to edit the first contact or any other of the duplicate contacts, except the last copy.

This issue is unresolved and should not be closed:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/26989457?hl=en

"For example, my wife's name is Karolina. There are two identical Karolina contacts. If I click on the top one and then try to edit it, I get the message "Failed to open editor". When I click on the second Karolina contact, I can edit it and everything. And if I delete the first, uneditable Karolina contact, it deletes both contacts."

"I also noticed a contact that used to be named Pesho, but then a few months ago I changed the name to something else. Right now there are two Pesho contacts in the Google Phone -> Contacts tab. There is no Pesho contact in the Google Contacts app. Any ideas on how to clear this mess?"

This does NOT resolve the issue:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/26989457?hl=en&msgid=27358522

Kindly assist.
